fullText: Nothing is left unscathed. Jump-scare noises blow out your eardrums. Blinding lights and raining sparks make you crave Anna Wintour’s indoor sunglasses. And there’s so much billowing haze that on the evening I attended, a family in the front row sprinted up the aisle after five minutes as though their house had caught fire.

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: The review focuses entirely on overwhelming, unpleasant production elements that drove audience members to literally flee the theater, indicating a production that fails to engage audiences effectively. | GPT-4o-mini: The review is overwhelmingly negative, focusing on the discomfort and chaos of the production without any redeeming qualities.
